gate_1_eeat_score.name: E-E-A-T Score Validation

experience_signals: ✓ Direct database reference: 'Basierend auf über 1.000 Pferdebewertungen in der PferdeWert-Datenbank'
✓ Real-world cost scenarios with specific €-amounts (not generic ranges)
✓ Regional price differences based on actual market data
✓ Budget scenarios reflecting practical ownership experiences
expertise_signals: ✓ References to GOT (Gebührenordnung für Tierärzte) for veterinary costs
✓ FN (Deutsche Reiterliche Vereinigung) mentions for industry standards
✓ Technical terminology used correctly (AKU, Vollpension, Offenstall)
✓ Detailed cost breakdowns showing domain knowledge
⚠ Could benefit from citing more expert sources or case studies
authoritativeness_signals: ✓ Comprehensive coverage of all cost dimensions
✓ Professional presentation with structured data tables
✓ Internal links to related authoritative content
⚠ No external citations to veterinary associations or industry reports
trustworthiness_signals: ✓ Realistic cost ranges (not suspiciously low estimates)
✓ Balanced perspective on budget vs. quality trade-offs
✓ No promotional language or affiliate marketing tactics

recommendations: Add 1-2 external citations to veterinary associations or equestrian industry reports
Consider adding a brief author bio or 'About PferdeWert' section for additional authority
Include a specific case study or real owner testimonial for enhanced experience signals

gate_2_readability.name: Readability Analysis
strengths: Excellent readability score for German audience (72/100)
Short paragraphs enhance mobile readability
Tables make complex cost data easily scannable
Clear visual hierarchy with headers and lists

gate_3_keyword_density.name: Keyword Density Validation

over_optimization_check.notes: Good balance between exact matches and semantic variations

warnings: ⚠ 'pferd kosten' at 0.61% (slightly above 0.6% target) - acceptable but monitor
recommendations: Consider replacing 1-2 instances of 'pferd kosten' with semantic variations like 'Ausgaben für Pferde' or 'finanzielle Belastung'
Overall keyword optimization is excellent - no major changes needed

strengths: Exceeds SERP median by 37.6% (strong competitive advantage)

Comprehensive topic coverage without fluff
Well-structured with 9 major sections + 24 subsections
